column5: Didn't want to hijack Skud's post Mike, but I just noticed your sig at the bottom of your page.  It sure says alot.
Right! Not all are as fortunate!

Heard that line in "Braveheart" as well  Somewhat along the lines of Shakespeare's  "A coward dies a thousand deaths yet a hero dies but once"  something to ponder in a world that has a new out ta getchya every week
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I1G_Bzu52DY Great quote but it's unfortunate it had to come from the lips of Mel Gibson!
